RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 79. Maiden Special Weight Purse 75000. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ICE THE KICKER established the front and showed the way in hand just off the inside, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch, edged away under a drive to the eighth pole, held well and clear to the finish to prevail. DUNEDIN CAUSEWAY broke out at the start bumping SWEPT twice, prompted the pace three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch, ran on to chase the winner home clear of the rest and second best. ROB THE BANK coaxed from the gate, chased two to three wide until tucked inside through the turn, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, kept on to secure the show honors. GOLDFIRE coaxed from the start, chased along the inside and then just off the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, continued in the two path into upper stretch, passed tired rivals. RETAIL MAN was hard to load prior to the start, broke in brushing the near side stall at the start, raced forwardly placed four wide down the backstretch and through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled six wide into upper stretch, weakened. SWEPT broke in at the start and was bumped by DUNEDIN CAUSEWAY twice as that foe broke outwards, conceded four to five lengths to the front before settling into stride, chased six paths off the inside down the backstretch and through the turn coming under coaxing midway, went seven wide at the head of the stretch and made no impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Goldfire
ENTRY.OWNER: Zilla Racing Stables Black Jack Racing LLC and Acqua Nova Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased ins, coaxed 2p 3/8, 2w 1/4p, passed tired foes

ENTRY.NAME: Rob the Bank
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2-3w, coaxed ins 3/8, 2w 1/4p, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Ice the Kicker
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 2p, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, edged away, held well

ENTRY.NAME: Dunedin Causeway
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, prompted 3w, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, second best

ENTRY.NAME: Swept
ENTRY.OWNER: Chapman James K and Amerman Anne
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in, bumped 2x st, chased 6w, coaxed 3/8, 7w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Retail Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: hard to load, brush gate, 4w in aim, angled 6w upper, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 2 1 1/8M Dirt CR: 97. Claiming Purse 55000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $20,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (1.5% Aftercare A ssessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BOLD VICTORY dropped from the two path to the rail on the first turn, settled at the rear, was roused in the two then three path on the far turn, came five wide into upper stretch, rallied outside in the final furlong and closed well to get up late. JUST CALL RAY dropped from the four path to the two path on the first turn, was rated off the pace, rallied two then three wide on the far turn, made a bid at the five-sixteenths, kicked clear in upper stretch, drifted out late, led until the final stride but was denied. HIGHER QUALITY jostled with a rival nearing the first turn, set the pace on the inside, was asked on the far turn, lost the lead near the three-eighths pole, dropped back in upper stretch, fought back gamely in the final furlong, made a bid late and just missed while clear for the show. SIX PERCENT jostled with a foe nearing the first turn, prompted the pace on the outside in the two to three path, was asked on the far turn, led from the three-eighths pole to outside the quarter-pole then lost the advantage, dropped back under a drive in upper stretch and weakened. TOMMY BEE was hustled from the gate, tracked the pace on the outside in the three to four path, chased on the far turn, spun six wide into upper stretch and came up empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Higher Quality
ENTRY.OWNER: Chatterpaul Naipaul Barrias Gregory A and Dreste Richard
ENTRY.COMMENT: jostled early,inside pace,headed upper stretch,fought back,gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Six Percent
ENTRY.COMMENT: jostled early,prompt out 2-3p,ask2nd turn,led3/8-5/16,weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Bold Victory
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p-ins1st,settled,2-3p2nd,5p3/16,rallied,closed well,up late

ENTRY.NAME: Tommy Bee
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,3-4p1st,tracked outside,chased 3-4p2nd turn,6p3/16,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Just Call Ray
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-2p1st,rated,2-3p2nd turn,rallied,clear1/8,drift out,caught wire

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 3 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 97. Claiming Purse 36000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At T ime Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISTER J T broke out at the start bumping QUICKFLASH, chased four then three wide down the backstretch and then two to three wide through the far turn, remained patiently handled swinging three to four wide into upper stretch, was under a hold behind a wall of rivals slugging it out on the front nearing the eighth pole, opted to tip out bulling his way out by bumping STRIKING SPEED twice and nearly forcing that rival to clip heels to make a lane for himself at that station, then forged clear in hand much the best in the late stages. MR PHIL hustled from the gate, chased four to five paths off the inside down the backstretch and then just off the inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch, rallied to take narrow and brief command inside the eighth pole, got overhauled inside the sixteenth marker and ran on to safely preserve the place honors. BLAKE B. chased along the inside and then just off the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, rallied up the rail with a mild kick briefly pausing inside of ENSIGN PARKER when that rival drifted in a furlong out. QUICKFLASH got bumped at the start by MISTER J T, came under hustling and chased six to seven paths off the inside down the backstretch and then three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command a furlong out before being headed for the front just inside that station, then weakened in the late stages. ENSIGN PARKER coaxed from the gate, showed the way in hand four then three wide before tucking inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, dug in under a drive and was collared nearing the eighth pole, then weakened in the late going. BOURBON'S HOPE coaxed from the start, chased three then two wide, tipped out four wide near the three-eighths, went five to six wide into upper stretch and weakened. STRIKING SPEED seven to eight paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked four wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung five wide into upper stretch, rallied to latch on outside a quartet with three-sixteenths to go, had MISTER J T angle out from his inside nearing the eighth pole when still latched on and was bumped solidly twice and nudged out of the way for a clear path, then weakened through to the finish. There was a Stewards' Inquiry into the stretch run focusing on MISTER J T before the result was allowed the stand and the race was declared official.

ENTRY.NAME: Bourbon's Hope
ENTRY.OWNER: Bowman Daniel Bowman Trey and Smith Daniel
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 3-2w, tipped 4w 3/8, 5-6w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Ensign Parker
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand 4-3w, ins turn, 2w 1/4p, collared, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Mr Phil
ENTRY.OWNER: Goldfarb Sanford J Madaket Stables LLC Casal Jorge and Estate of Ira Davis
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, 4-5w backstretch, 2p turn, 3w uppr, led, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Blake B.
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, rail rally, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Mister J T
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased 4-3w, beh foes to 1/8, bull way out, clear

ENTRY.NAME: Quickflash
ENTRY.OWNER: Two B and One C Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, hustled, 6-7w early, 3w turn, 4w uppr, up 1/8, wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Striking Speed
ENTRY.COMMENT: 7-8w backstretch, 4w turn, 5w upper, bumped 2x 1/8, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 84. Maiden Claiming Purse 47000. (UP TO $8,178 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DUKE OF GLOUCESTER went to the front, showed the way with a clear advantage, dictated terms in the two path on the turn, responded well when set down in upper stretch, drew off into the final furlong, remained clear under a drive into the final sixteenth then maintained a safe advantage while eased up in the final strides. BOLT D'PLATA was rated while off the inside, dropped in leaving the backstretch, saved ground on the turn, swung out four to five wide into upper stretch, chased into the final furlong, dropped in near the sixteenth-pole and finished willingly for the place. BRAGGADOCIOUS stumbled at the start, settled on the outside, moved closer in the five path on the turn, came six wide into upper stretch under the crop and lacked the needed response but just earned the show. SIXWILLBERICH was forwardly placed on the outside, chased in the three path on the turn and tired then just missed the show. COLLECT FROM IKE was rated just off the pace, saved ground while roused on the turn and came up empty. THE ELUSIVE DRWONG dropped well behind, lost action nearing the seven-eighths, settled at the back, went three wide on the turn, remained on his left lead in the stretch and was no factor. TIMO settled off the pace, was urged along late on the backstretch, saved ground on the turn and failed to threaten. FIRE BARON was reserved off the pace, moved from three to five wide while roused on the turn and failed to respond. ASSERTIVE ATTITUDE settled off the pace, was urged along late on the backstretch, went two then three wide on the turn and faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Timo
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled,urged1/2,inside turn,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Bolt d'Plata
ENTRY.OWNER: R A Hill Stable and Gatsas Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated,off rail,ins-2path turn,swung out 1/4,mvd in1/16,willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Duke of Gloucester
ENTRY.COMMENT: clear pace,2path turn,responded,eased up final strides

ENTRY.NAME: Collect From Ike
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand,rated,asked inside turn,came up empty

ENTRY.NAME: Fire Baron
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, roused 3-5wide turn, no response

ENTRY.NAME: The Elusive Drwong
ENTRY.COMMENT: lost action 7/8,well behind,3w turn,left lead lane,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Braggadocious
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled brk,settled outside,closer 4w turn,6w1/4,missed show

ENTRY.NAME: Assertive Attitude
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, urged 1/2, 2-3path turn, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Sixwillberich
ENTRY.COMMENT: up close,outside,chased 3wide turn,tired,missed show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 91. Allowance Purse 100000. (UP TO $17,400 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners O f A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs. (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile on the Main Track.) (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LIBBAN showed the way early on from the two path before being engaged in head to head combat with SISTER BRIDGET to the inside five furlongs from home, got given a notch to work with three furlongs out and shook off that rival coming inwards slightly, widened away when swinging three wide into upper stretch, edged clear under a drive and held well to the finish. LISA'S VISION bobbled at the start and was bumped by SISTER BRIDGET breaking outwards and in turn brushed ROYAL DAME, chased three wide under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive chasing the winner home well clear of the rest to be along second best. SISTER BRIDGET (IRE) broke out at the start bumping LISA'S VISION, raced forwardly placed along the inside before advancing to duel with the top one from the five-eighths to the three-eighths marker, got shaken off and spun just off the inside into upper stretch, then weakened to the finish. ROYAL DAME got brushed at the start by LISA'S VISION, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch and tired. SHE CAUGHT MY EYE four wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, swung five wide into upper stretch offering little and was eased to the finish. THOUGHT EXPERIMENT chased five wide, angled six wide into upper stretch, proved no factor and was eased home to the wire.

ENTRY.NAME: Thought Experiment
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 5w, tipped 6w upper, no factor, eased

ENTRY.NAME: Sister Bridget (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, forwardly placed ins, dueled 5/8-3/8, 2w 1/4p, wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Lisa's Vision
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled, bumped st, 3w pursuit, coaxed 5/16, 4w upper, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Royal Dame
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Libban
ENTRY.OWNER: C Two Racing Stable and Braverman Paul
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 2p, dueled 5/8-3/8, shook away, 3w upper, edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: She Caught My Eye
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w pursuit, coaxed 7/16, 5w upper, offered little, eased

TRACK.NAME: Foreign track with Code of FBL

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 87. Claiming Purse 45000. (UP TO $7,830 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR THREE YEAR OLD FILLIES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $35,000 (1.5% After care Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HOWZYOURCASHFLOW showed good early speed, lost the lead just inside the half-mile pole, vied in the two path on the turn, regained the advantage into upper stretch, fought outside of the runner-up to the finish and prevailed under strong urging. SOLIB was hustled from the gate, moved up to get the lead just inside the haff-mile pole, vied along the rail on the turn, lost the advantage to the winner into upper stretch, fought on well with that foe in the final furlong but missed. EVERLYS GIRL settled off the early pace, was rated behind horses late on the backstretch, raced inside to the three path while let out on the turn, came out a bit into upper stretch then had the rider lose his crop, pursued the top two in the drive and lacked the needed kick but was clear for the show. PROUD FOOT broke out then was corrected by the rider, raced just off the pace, chased four then three wide on the turn and tired. CUPIDS GIRL was ridden along on the outside, went five wide on the turn and failed to rally. DIAMOND COLLECTOR broke out then was corrected by the rider, was urged along off the pace, traveled around the turn in the two path and lacked the needed response. ROJA LIGERA showed early speed on the outside, dropped back leaving the backstretch, fell to the rear in the three path on the turn and capit.ulated.

ENTRY.NAME: Howzyourcashflow
ENTRY.OWNER: Rodriguez Rudy R and Witz Frank
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed,pace outside,headed7/16,2p turn,lead3/16,proved best

ENTRY.NAME: Everlys Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled,rated behind foes4-1/2,ins-3w turn,lost crop3/16,no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Solib
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,mvd up,lead7/16,ins turn,headed3/16,fought,missed

ENTRY.NAME: Diamond Collector
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,urged along,2path turn,lacked needed response

ENTRY.NAME: Proud Foot
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,just off pace,chased 4-3path turn,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Roja Ligera
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed outside,dropped back 7/16,3path turn,came up empty

ENTRY.NAME: Cupids Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: ridden along outside, 5wide turn, no rally

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 102. Allowance Purse 100000. (UP TO $17,400 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AWESOME NATIVE broke out at the start bumping BEZOS, chased along the inside and then just off the inside briefly before tipping four wide, continued four wide through the turn coming under coaxing near the three-eighths, angled five wide into upper stretch, rallied to issue a challenge through the final furlong collaring the leader seventy yards from the finish. SHAKY PANTS six paths off the inside in pursuit from mid pack, tucked four wide into the turn and advanced under coaxing nearing the quarter pole, swung five wide into upper stretch, took over command at the three-sixteenths, dug in under lone threat and was collared seventy yards from home while along well clear of the rest and second best. CAPONE broke in at the start bumping DAUFUSKIE ISLAND into PAY ZONE, raced forwardly placed five paths off the inside in aim of the pace dispute up front, advanced on those rivals midway on the turn, swung four wide into upper stretch offering up a bid, then weakened in the final furlong. BEZOS got bumped at the start by AWESOME NATIVE, who broke outwards, chased four to five paths off the inside down the backstretch and then three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch and improved position to secure the last major share. DAUFUSKIE ISLAND got bumped at the start by CAPONE and in turn bumped PAY ZONE, vied three to four wide down the backstretch before emerging to duel with KOOL KATHMANDU through the turn tucked to the two path, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, continued just off the inside into upper stretch and weakened. LEDDY coaxed from the gate, chased just off the inside down the backstretch before going five wide through the turn, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch and made no impact. KOOL KATHMANDU vied inside a pair before emerging into the turn to duel with DAUFUSKIE ISLAND to his outside, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch clinging to command, yielded the front straightened away and tired. PAY ZONE got bumped at the start by DAUFUSKIE ISLAND due to pressure from CAPONE, vied between foes from the two path, came under coaxing at the three-eighths when shaken off by the top pair and fading, cornered just off the inside in retreat and faltered in the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Native
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, ins briefly, chased 4w, coax 3/8, 5w 1/4, up fin 70yd

ENTRY.NAME: Bezos
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased 4-5w, coaxed 3w 3/8, 3w upper, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Kool Kathmandu
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, dueled ins turn, inside 1/4, yielded, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Leddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2p, coaxed 5w 3/8, 4w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Pay Zone
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, vied 2p, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Daufuskie Island
ENTRY.OWNER: Scuderi Vincent S Imperio Michael Rodriguez Rudy R and Cotrone Robert
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, vied 3-4w, dueled 2p turn, 2w 1/4p, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Capone
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, 5w off pace dispute, 3w turn, 4w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Shaky Pants
ENTRY.COMMENT: 6w backstretch, 4w turn, 5w upper, up 3/16, caught, 2nd best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Carle Place S. BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 93. Stakes Purse 125000. OUTER TURF FOR THREE YEAR OLDS.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NINETYPRCENTMADDIE broke alertly from the outside post, dropped to the rear under urging, went four then five wide on the turn, rallied six wide into the stretch, closed well to make a bid inside the furlong marker and got up in the final sixteenth to prevail. JUST BEAT THE ODDS was last to commence then brushed with a foe, tracked the leading duo, moved out late on the backstretch, chased three then four wide on the turn, gained five wide into the stretch, took a short lead into the final furlong, led into the final sixteenth, fought on well to the finish but was denied. SUPER CHOW was hustled from the gate, pressed the pace on the outside, took the lead in the two to three path on the turn, was asked for his best in upper stretch, lost the advantage into the final furlong, drifted out some while battling on into the final sixteenth then was outfinished. SIR LANCELOT brushed with a foe at the start, went to the front, set the pace under pressure to his outside, vied along the rail on the turn, lost the advantage outside the three-eighths, dropped back into the stretch and stopped then was eased but walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Just Beat the Odds
ENTRY.COMMENT: lst awy,brshd,trckd,mvd out1/2,chsd 3-4w,5w1/4,led1/8-1/16,denied

ENTRY.NAME: Sir Lancelot
ENTRY.OWNER: Moore Susan B and Moore III John C
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed brk,to front,set pressured pace,ins,headed3/8,stop,eased

ENTRY.NAME: Super Chow
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,pressed outside,2-3p,lead3/8,headed1/8,outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Ninetyprcentmaddie
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly,drop back,urged,4-5w turn,6w1/4,rallied,up late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 9 7F Dirt CR: 76. Maiden Special Weight Purse 75000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DOLOMITE coaxed from the gate, chased two to three wide down the backstretch and then four wide through the turn, advanced to take over continuing four wide into upper stretch, drew clear under a drive and was geared down inside the final sixteenth to prevail comfortably at the end. MUNNY GRAB chased five then four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch, proved no match for the top one while running on clear of the rest and along second best. CAROL T dueled from the three path with COLLECT THE DATA to her inside, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and weakened while along for the show honors. MISS LAO chased five to six paths off the inside down the backstretch and then three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four to five wide into upper stretch and improved position to the finish. SCARLET'S DREAM chased six to seven paths off the inside down the backstretch and then five wide through the turn coaxed along from the three-eighths, cornered four wide into upper stretch, weakened in the drive. MEL'S BABY SISTER broke a half a beat slow without incident, chased four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun two to three wide into upper stretch and passed tired rivals to the finish. MIA NIPOTINA broke out at the start, chased just off the inside and then along the inside coming under coaxing three furlongs from home, angled six to seven wide into upper stretch and tired. COLLECT THE DATA broke inwards hitting the near side stall at the start and came under coaxing to advance inside, dueled from the two path with CAROL T to her outside coming under coaxing near the quarter pole before being set down taking the inside route into upper stretch, then tired to the finish. LOVE THYSELF chased four paths off the inside down the backstretch and then just off the inside through the turn coaxed along from midway, angled in to take the inside route into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Collect the Data
ENTRY.COMMENT: hit gate st, coaxed, dueled 2p, set down ins 1/4, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Dolomite
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2-3w, 4w turn, took over 4w upper, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Carol T
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 3p, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Mia Nipotina
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased 2p, coaxed ins 3/8, 6-7w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Mel's Baby Sister
ENTRY.COMMENT: off 1/2 slw, chased 4w, coaxed 3/8, 2-3w upper, passed tired foes

ENTRY.NAME: Love Thyself
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4-2w, coaxed 3/8, inside 1/4, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Munny Grab
ENTRY.OWNER: Magic Cap Stables and Hayden Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 5-4w, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, no match, ran on, second best

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Lao
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5-6w backstretch, 3w turn, coaxed 3/8, 4-5w upper, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Scarlet's Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: 6-7w backstretch, coaxed 5w 3/8, 4w upper, weakened
